title: New Ranked Match
body: alright just now i was in a champ select in ranked with a mate and when everything was sussed the champ select crashes... i waited 15 minutes for that thing and now 15 more... please fix

replies.body: no no the client didnt crash, the champ select did and there was a message that popped up somewhere along the lines of "oof... something something cant remember"

Hey toxique,

What was going on in champ select when it crashed, and did you get any errors when it did? If you continue to have problems with crashing, please check out the [Bug Splat & Game Crash guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) and perform the steps listed to repair your client. Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
